metadata.title: CVE-2018-17231 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Telegram Desktop (aka tdesktop) 1.3.14 might allow attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and application exit) via an "Edit color palette" search that triggers an "index out of range" condition. NOTE: this issue is disputed by multiple third parties because the described attack scenario does not cross a privilege boundary.

notes.note: ebarretto> Disputed as attack scenario does not cross a privilege boundary.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
